channel.title: Dragon full helm madness!
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3pFDj0B_x5Q
Heh, i thought i would see how many people went mad over it.
Heres a picture i just got
[img]http://img262.imageshack.us/img262/7742/dragfullhelmmo9.jpg[/img]

item.title: Dragon full helm madness!
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

[quote=“pko, post:20, topic:119443”][quote author=Mod Taharok link=topic=168871.msg1568136#msg1568136 date=1183541349]

OMG, Another stupid move by jagex. They tryed to make it all cool looking. Well they shoulda just made a regular full helm that was red.

That helm looks like the hunter helm.

And what dragon piece is a normal piece of armor colored red? I will answer that question, none of them. Jagex wants Dragon to look exotic, intimidating, and rare. In my honest opinion, they hit all three of the those pointers with flying colors in this new update.
[/quote]

Thanks mod taharok, because I wanted to say this. I think they aim to make the dragon items look different, not just a different color. This new helm looks quite different, and I dont think it looks to bad. I liked it, and I hope more updates like this in the future.[/quote]
That helm looks like the hunter helm.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon full helm madness!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“Mod Taharok, post:18, topic:119443”][quote author=Tr3v0r link=topic=168871.msg1568131#msg1568131 date=1183541140]
OMG, Another stupid move by jagex. They tryed to make it all cool looking. Well they shoulda just made a regular full helm that was red.
[/quote]

And what dragon piece is a normal piece of armor colored red? I will answer that question, none of them. Jagex wants Dragon to look exotic, intimidating, and rare. In my honest opinion, they hit all three of the those pointers with flying colors in this new update. ;)[/quote]

Now you just want to be different and pretend to like it

No, but i think ill buy one, once there is enough in the game to be at a stable price to see what it looks like with drag chain and legs.

I really hated the dragon med helm, thats another ugly helm imo, so thats why i couldnt wait for this update but yeah, looks horrible without drag i havnt see what it looks like with drag.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon full helm madness!
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“Mod Taharok, post:18, topic:119443”][quote author=Tr3v0r link=topic=168871.msg1568131#msg1568131 date=1183541140]
OMG, Another stupid move by jagex. They tryed to make it all cool looking. Well they shoulda just made a regular full helm that was red.
[/quote]

And what dragon piece is a normal piece of armor colored red? I will answer that question, none of them. Jagex wants Dragon to look exotic, intimidating, and rare. In my honest opinion, they hit all three of the those pointers with flying colors in this new update. ;)[/quote]

Thanks mod taharok, because I wanted to say this. I think they aim to make the dragon items look different, not just a different color. This new helm looks quite different, and I dont think it looks to bad. I liked it, and I hope more updates like this in the future.

Read full topic

[/quote]

And what dragon piece is a normal piece of armor colored red? I will answer that question, none of them. Jagex wants Dragon to look exotic, intimidating, and rare. In my honest opinion, they hit all three of the those pointers with flying colors in this new update. ;)[/quote]

Exactly, and if you don’t like it, don’t buy it.

item.title: Dragon full helm madness!
item.dc:creator: @Dell451 Dell451
item.description:
@Dell451 wrote:

Wow…That brings back memories of July 6, last year.

Hell, if I didn’t see that helm, I would of thought that was 6/6/6…
And yes, I was really there

You know the RS market dropped steeply after that?
Anything Dragon is is 300k more now…

item.title: Dragon full helm madness!
item.dc:creator: @Kulkka Kulkka
item.description:
@Kulkka wrote:

[quote=“Mod Taharok, post:12, topic:119443”]That is insanity…

Jagex messes up a long awaited update again…Remember Stronghold of Security?They said there was ARMOUR.There was 10k and 2 pairs of fhking boots…Lol.

Wonder what will they do next?Make a dragon platebody that looks like a pile of shit on you?

If you have a problem with their updates, simply don’t play. However, if you do keep playing, PLEASE stop complaining. It is just annoying and does not help anyone.[/quote]
I have no problems with their updates.I just dont like it when they mess up with the updates.

Read full topic
